name: This World
description:
For  now the development has... Stock photo's.  As backgrounds.

This World is a story heavily inspired by Alice In Wonderland.

Elizabeth, the main character falls uncounsious and fins herself in a palace garden, where she meets a young boy.  She explores this new world in search of answers.
